title: Using LATTICE SEMICONDUCTOR (ticker: LSCC) FY 2024 10-K and FRED annual nominal GDP data (current US$) calcualte year over year % change in gross profit generated from customers in China from FY 2023 to FY 2024 assuming FY2023 Revenue from China is as reported in the most recent 10-K filing, year over year % change of revenue in China from FY2023 to FY2024 is equal to annual nominal % growth rate of GDP of China in 2024, gross margins of renenue in China is equal to consolidated gross margin in both periods. Provide answer in % rounded to 2 decimals.
description:
1. Extract FY2023 revenue from customers in China from LSCC’s FY 2024 Form 10-K (Note 3): 
 FY2023 revenue from customers in China = $239,192 thousand 
 
 2. Extract FY2023 Consolidated Revenue: $737,154
 
 3. Extract FY2024 Consolidated Revenue: $509,401
 
 4. Extract FY2023 Consolidated gross profit: $514,670
 
 5. Extract FY2024 Consolidated gross profit: $340,400
 
 6. Calculate consolidated gross margin for FY2023 and FY2024:
 FY2023 Gross margin = 69.8%
 FY2024 Gross margin = 66.8%
 
 
 7. Pull FRED annual nominal GDP (current US$) for China and compute 2024 nominal growth: GDP2024 = $18,743,803,170,827.2; GDP2023 = $18,270,356,654,533.2; growth g = (GDP2024/GDP2023 − 1) = 0.0259133702 = 2.59133702%. (FRED series “Gross Domestic Product for China,” MKTGDPCNA646NWDB, updated Jul 2, 2025.)
 
 8. Project FY2024 China revenue using the assumption that China revenue grows at China’s 2024 nominal GDP rate: China Revenue FY2024 = $239,192,000 × (1 + 0.0259133702) = $245,390,270.85.
 
 9. Compute gross profit by applying consolidated gross margin to China revenue in each year, then calculate YoY % change:
  - Gross profit FY2023 = $239,192,000 × 0.698 = $166,956,016.00.
  - Gross profit FY2024 = $245,390,270.85 × 0.668 = $163,920,700.93.
  - YoY % change = [(Gross profit FY2024 − Gross profit FY2023) / Gross profit FY2023] × 100 = [($163,920,700.93 − $166,956,016.00) / $166,956,016.00] × 100 = −1.8180% → −1.82%

rubric.criteria: FY2023 revenue from customers in China = $239,192 thousand
Year‑over‑year % change in China gross profit = -1.82%
